flawed_nl_solution:
Before Samuel walked across the porch, there were 331 - 223 = <<331-223=104>>104 dust particles.
Those 104 were 1/10 of the original amount, so there were 104 * 10 = <<104*10=1040>>1040 dust particles on the porch before Samuel swept.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 104. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
